title: Sweet 'N' Sour Curry Chicken
directions: In a 3-qt. slow cooker, combine the chicken, tomatoes, green pepper, onion, chutney and curry powder. Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until chicken is no longer pink.
Combine cornstarch and water until smooth; stir into slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 30 minutes or until thickened. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 can (14-1/2 ounces) stewed tomatoes, cut up
1 large green pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
